channel.title: AIGE(Skat3rboy21) LoginScreen Design
channel.description:
[center][i][b]Hi Everyone,[/b][/i]
[i][b]I been working on a loginScreen project design and finally finished, I hope everyone likes the design.[/b][/i]

item.title: AIGE(Skat3rboy21) LoginScreen Design
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Second one is a lot better, but I still don’t like either…

Facebook button and the arrow (assuming its enter login button?) are just too big and off to the sides, I feel it looks dumb.

The login boxes themselves: first too dark, tabbed design is okay, but don’t create a gap in the middle. Add color offsets/textures to show the box as well as display which tab is selected.
Second one: I feel the login button is cast out of the overall appearance due to being alone in the vast space to the side. The URL links are more likely than unneeded. If you want a website quick-link, perhaps add a “browser” image, or maybe a URL bar to the side/under the box. Currently it looks odd underneath the password field.

Read full topic

item.title: AIGE(Skat3rboy21) LoginScreen Design
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Looks okay. Wouldn’t match a rsps though. All you really did was put text over a background and make a login box. The first login box needs texture or somesides black for the background. The second one looks better than the first.

Read full topic
